Summary: I was recording the moon when a fast flashing light came across my telescope
divs: sighting detailswhile i was in my backyard recording the moon with my telescope and my laptop on aug 17 th 13 i noticed two quick flashes ( i though i saw it, it was so fast) and the next day when i review it, this is what i saw: a light that seems to stop and go, stop and go and you can see the streak behind it. the original video is about 20-25 min long. the segment on you tube is 50 sec. long and the light appears around 24 sec. i hope that with your editing knowledge you can enhance the video. please let me know whatever your opinion is about it. this is real i dont know anything about video editing otherwise i would have zoomed in and slow it down. this is the you tube web address: [link moved to fi section\cms\tg] thanks and i would really appreciate any comments about it (pos. or neg.). [name removed\cms\tg] (pardon my english - is my second language-)
